title: Voice & Audio
description: Learn how to manage voice files and record audio for your visual novel

steps.title: Voice Manager
steps.content: The Voice Manager links audio files to dialogue in your story. Preview and organize voice recordings here.

steps.title: Voice Files
steps.content: Each row represents a dialogue line. Link voice files by dragging audio assets or clicking the browse button.

steps.title: Preview Audio
steps.content: Click the play button to preview a voice file. This helps verify the correct audio is linked.

steps.title: Voice Studio
steps.content: Use the Voice Studio to record new audio directly in the editor. Useful for placeholder or final recordings.

steps.title: Record Audio
steps.content: Click the record button to start recording. Speak clearly and click again to stop.

steps.title: Audio Mixer
steps.content: The Audio Mixer controls volume levels for voice, music, and sound effects during playback.
